About the Company: LGB Forge Limited is engaged in forged and machined components. The Company focuses mainly on manufacturing auto, electrical and transmission forged components. The Company is also supplying non automotive segments like valve industry and infrastructure equipment industry. The Companys products include hot forging, hot & warm forging and cold forging. The Company has three operations one in Mysore and one in Coimbatore for hot, warm and one for cold forging activities.
